description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; in green and black ink a man is in the foreground on the right side looking directly at the viewer; behind his left shoulder is a woman in profile with eyes downcast; a large band of green ink runs across the image in the upper half of the print
inscription: ULC in print: W.G. 22 | LL below image, in pencil: 5 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.160
portfolio: From Plate 6 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
title: The Couple (Self-Portrait with Wife), Plate 6 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
